metadata.title: CVE-2020-23026 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference in the main() function dhry_1.c of dhrystone 2.1causes a denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
